00029 void NeuralNetAtlas::doApprox(Observation& obs, Vector& output) {
00030 
00031     assert(obs.getFeatures().size1() == (unsigned int)dims(0));
00032     // For efficiency (both space and time) we treat the single layer
00033     // case and multi-layer cases differently, using the obs as the
00034     // first activation and output as the final output activation.
00035 
00036     //Linear network
00037     if (layers < 2) {
00038         //axpy_prod(column(obs.getFeatures(), obs.getAgent()), layerParams[0], output, true);
00039         atlas::gemv(CblasTrans, 1.,
00040                     layerParams[0],
00041                     column(obs.getFeatures(), obs.getAgent()),
00042                     0.,
00043                     output
00044                     );
00045         if ((int)squash[1]) squashVec(output);
00046     } 
00047     else {
00048         int l=0;
00049 
00050         // First layer
00051         //axpy_prod(column(obs.getFeatures(), obs.getAgent()), layerParams[l],  activations[l], true);
00052         atlas::gemv(CblasTrans, 1.,
00053                     layerParams[l],
00054                     column(obs.getFeatures(), obs.getAgent()),
00055                     0.,
00056                     activations[l]
00057                     );
00058         // Squash output of first layer? A little confusing since we
00059         // must check squash[l+1] to see if we squash activations[l]
00060         if ((int)squash[l+1]) squashVec(activations[l]);
00061         l++;
00062         
00063         // Middle layers
00064         for (; l < layers-1; l++) {
00065             //axpy_prod(activations[l-1], layerParams[l], activations[l], true);
00066             atlas::gemv(CblasTrans, 1.,
00067                         layerParams[l],
00068                         activations[l-1],
00069                         0.,
00070                         activations[l]
00071                         );
00072             if ((int)squash[l+1]) squashVec(activations[l]);
00073         }
00074         
00075         // Output layer
00076         //axpy_prod(activations[l-1], layerParams[l], output, true);
00077         atlas::gemv(CblasTrans, 1.,
00078                     layerParams[l],
00079                     activations[l-1],
00080                     0.,
00081                     output
00082                     );
00083         if ((int)squash[l+1]) squashVec(output);
00084 
00085     }
00086 
00087 }
00088

00099 void NeuralNetAtlas::feedbackGrad(Observation& obs, Vector& outputDeltas) {
00100     
00101     // Single layer case
00102     if (layers < 2) {
00103         // rank one update = outer produc of two vectors
00104         // Compute grad for only layer
00105         //noalias(layerTraces[0]) += outer_prod(column(obs.getFeatures(), obs.getAgent()), outputDeltas);
00106         atlas::ger(column(obs.getFeatures(), obs.getAgent()),
00107                    outputDeltas, 
00108                    layerTraces[0]
00109                    );
00110     }
00111     else {
00112         int l = layers - 1;
00113 
00114         // Compute grad for last layer
00115         //noalias(layerTraces[l]) += outer_prod(activations[l-1], outputDeltas);
00116         atlas::ger(activations[l-1],
00117                    outputDeltas,
00118                    layerTraces[l]
00119                    );
00120         // Back prop deltas through last layer
00121         //axpy_prod(layerParams[l], outputDeltas, deltas[l-1], true);
00122         atlas::gemv(CblasNoTrans, 1.,
00123                     layerParams[l],
00124                     outputDeltas,
00125                     0.,
00126                     deltas[l-1]
00127                     );
00128         // Feedback through squashing
00129         if ((int)squash[l]) dSquashVec(activations[l-1], deltas[l-1]);
00130         l--;
00131 
00132         // repeat for all hidden layers
00133         for (; l > 0; l--) {
00134             // Compute grad for current layer
00135             //noalias(layerTraces[l]) += outer_prod(activations[l-1], deltas[l]);
00136             atlas::ger(activations[l-1],
00137                        deltas[l-1],
00138                        layerTraces[l]
00139                        );
00140             // Back prop deltas through current layer
00141             //axpy_prod(layerParams[l], deltas[l], deltas[l-1], true);
00142             atlas::gemv(CblasNoTrans, 1.,
00143                         layerParams[l],
00144                         deltas[l],
00145                         0.,
00146                         deltas[l-1]
00147                         );
00148             // Feedback through squashing
00149             if ((int)squash[l]) dSquashVec(activations[l-1], deltas[l-1]);
00150         }
00151 
00152         // Compute grad for input layer
00153         //noalias(layerTraces[l]) += outer_prod(column(obs.getFeatures(), obs.getAgent()), deltas[l]);
00154         atlas::ger(column(obs.getFeatures(),obs.getAgent()),
00155                    deltas[l],
00156                    layerTraces[l]
00157                    );
00158         
00159     }
00160 
00161 }
00162 
00163 }
